entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Annapolis Royal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low.
